com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.lightengine

Class LightEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.lightengine.LightEngine

  • public class LightEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This Light engine calculates phong shading for three normals over the day. The data is relative to a position on a map because the lighting can be different on different positions on the map.
    Since:
    WE1.1
    Version:
    1.1.8

        public boolean isShadingPixelBased()

        Returns:
